New Records: Shakib al-Hasan scored 64* runs for Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Rishad Hossain brought Bangladesh back in the game with his bowling
Post-Match Reflections: Najmul Hossain Shanto praised Shakib's calmness as key to Bangladesh's innings
Scott Edwards said Bangladesh kept wickets in hand in the last five overs and it was hard bowling with windy boundaries
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA against Ireland on Friday could seal Pakistan's fate
Others: The wicket was a bit difficult early on, but it was still really good to bat on
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto said he's happy with the venue
